title: iPhone chipmaker TSMC hits snag in bringing production to US this year
content:
It’s been almost two years since Apple chipmaker TSMC announced its plans to construct a plant in Arizona. Now, a report indicates that the company is three to six months behind schedule.

more…

The post iPhone chipmaker TSMC hits snag in bringing production to US this year appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A report indicates that Apple chipmaker TSMC is three to six months behind schedule on its plans to construct a plant in Arizona.
